Title: S6 Ep. 237 Lyss Morton - Startup Mompreneurs
Description:
I met Lyss Morton through a Facebook group looking for #femalefounders and was invited onto her podcast! What a smart savvy business mind and host! I knew I wanted to have her on my show. She did not disappoint, we talked about how she launched her career and business, along with #FutureofWork and #Entrepreneur #Challenges she overcame. This will definitely leave you #Inspired. 

The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing diversity through #DEI #Skills-based #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike. Sign up to be an #Employer4Change that invests in #intern #talent and your #employees.

Want a break? Play Intern Pursuit Game on Steam.  Thank you to our sponsor Cat 5 Studios.
